field.label: Research Interests
field.value: 1) Evolution of regulatory sequences, 2) the role of transposable elements in host gene regulation and 3) impact of genome rearrangements in evolution and in cancer. One of the objectives of my lab is to characterize the epigenome of different cell-types in various primate-species to better understand how the genome has evolve and to better predict the impact of variants or mutation in non-coding DNA. We also work on facilitating the distribution of genomics data and tools to the broad scientific community.

bilingual.english: 1) Evolution of regulatory sequences, 2) the role of transposable elements in host gene regulation and 3) impact of genome rearrangements in evolution and in cancer. One of the objectives of my lab is to characterize the epigenome of different cell-types in various primate-species to better understand how the genome has evolve and to better predict the impact of variants or mutation in non-coding DNA. We also work on facilitating the distribution of genomics data and tools to the broad scientific community.
